text: aur hamane (tumhaare samajhaane ke vaaste) tumhaaree hee ek misaal bayaan kee hai hamane jo kuchh tumhe ata kiya hai kya usamen tumhaaree laundee gulaamon mein se koee (bhee) tumhaara shareek hai ki (vah aur) tum usamen baraabar ho jao (aur kya) tum unase aisa hee khauph rakhate ho jitana tumhen apane logon ka (haq hissa na dene mein) khauph hota hai phir bandon ko khuda ka shareek kyon banaate ho) akl mandon ke vaaste ham yoon apanee aayaton ko taphaseeladaar bayaan karate hain
